title: Homeric Hymns To Apollo 3
body: analysis of the figura etymologica ‘eukhomenos epos ēuda’ in Homeric Greek and comparison of the figure in Indo-Iranian (Bartholomae’s 1887 texts cited in a comparison) [MRBTP: 'f']

title: Homeric Hymns To Apollo 5
body: in a list of examples where the hymnic salutation khaire/khairete is not followed by an explicit metabasis
